spanGrp.span: We Urum people are Christians, we go to the church and they don’t.
biz urumuh khristianıh giderıh kissäya onnar getmerlär kissäya
When they first came here they had their eyes covered, we were laughing at them.
onnar birınji gäldılär burya ište gözläri bağli üstlärınä gülerdıh
There is a huge difference between us and them, they looked at us and improved a bit in dressing.
bizım onnarın arada eykä dağ var ište bizä bahtılar biräz geinmäh_meinmäh šindi biräz irälädılär
We had no relationships with them as we did not know Georgian and they did not know Turkish, but then we have learned Georgian and so they Turkish.
atnašenia onnarınan yoğudi biz gürjüjä bülmirdıh onnar turetski bülmerdılär sora ištem biz gürjüjäi alıštıh onnar turetskii alıštılar
Step by step we started our friendship, but we go to the church and they don’t, they just look from a side.
de yavaš yavaš de družit_mružit edirıh da bizlär giderıh kissäya onnar getmirlär bahirlär ğırahtan
We are Christians when they are Muslims and that is why they don’t go to the church, they have other religion we have another.
biz khristianıh onnar musulmandırlär onučun getmirlär kissä_missäya onnarın airi religia bizım airi
They have a quite different religion and so do we.
onnarın ädätläri ögzä savem bizım savsem ögzä onučunda čoğ at edirıh
